Text:
Much respect for the up ... seriously ... thanks.

Gotta say though, some info on what fights are in this download would be massively appreciated.

great quality, anyone just wanting to watch the main fight here's a 1.3gb file to save bandwidth
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6364298/UFC_129_St._Pierre_versus_Shields_main_fight_only_720p

in1Ose, and everyone else wondering... this is is the whole PPV broadcast start to finish, no cuts, I think it was 3hrs 48min.  I think the PPV broadcast was able to fit in two prelims - Jobouin vs Garza (the very first bout of the evening) and Menjivar vs Valencia.

NO spoilers (even tho it's almost a month later lol) but this is one of the best overall events maybe in all of UFC history.  Download the prelims, too.  Nothing to miss, every fight has something unique.

Hey Sceneline,

Thank you very much for this episode, I download the UFC episodes for a friend and I was wondering if you could upload the UFC 130 as soon as possible.

Thank you,
DJ Wannabe
